sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"劝告，主张，建议"之意。
means: recommend ： 指向对方提出公开的建议或规劝。
advocate ： 指公开表明对某事或某行为的完全赞同，语气强于recommend。
propose ： 多指较正式地提出建议。
suggest ： 语气较委婉，指提出不成熟的建议或参考意见。
prescribe ： 多指医生对病人在用药或饮食等方面的建议。

sentence.Network_en: I've just seen a play that I can highly recommend.
sentence.Network_cn: 我刚看了一场话剧，我强烈推荐。

sentence.Network_en: He had little but his enthusiasm to recommend him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拥有的优势只有他的热情。

sentence.Network_en: Most authorities recommend letting the baby nurse whenever it wants.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分权威人士建议婴儿饿了就随时喂奶。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from medieval Latin recommendare, from Latin re- (expressing intensive force) + commendare 'commit to the care of'

encyclopedia.content: recommended recommending recommends Verb ·push for something; "The travel agent recommended strongly that we not travel on Thanksgiving Day" (synonym) urge, advocate (hypernym) propose, suggest, advise (derivation) recommendation ·express a good opinion of (synonym) commend (hypernym) praise (derivation) recommendation, testimonial, good word ·make attractive or acceptable; "Hon

entry.def: If someone recommends a person or thing to you, they suggest that you would find that person or thing good or useful.

example.ex: I have just spent a holiday there and would recommend it to anyone...
example.tran: 我刚刚在那里度过假，很想把它推荐给每一个人。

example.ex: 'You're a good worker, boy,' he told him. 'I'll recommend you for a promotion.'...
example.tran: “你是个好员工，孩子，”他告诉他，“我将推荐你升职。”

entry.def: If you recommend that something is done, you suggest that it should be done.

example.ex: The judge recommended that he serve 20 years in prison...
example.tran: 法官建议判处他20年监禁。

example.ex: We strongly recommend reporting the incident to the police...

entry.def: If something or someone has a particular quality to recommend them, that quality makes them attractive or gives them an advantage over similar things or people.

example.ex: La Noblesse restaurant has much to recommend it...
example.tran: “贵族”餐馆有很多值得称道之处。

example.ex: He had little but his enthusiasm to recommend him...
example.tran: 他拥有的优势只有他的热情。

sentences.sentence: "The travel agent recommended strongly that we not travel on Thanksgiving Day"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

Sentence.sentence: I recommend Harvard's 2011 "Pathways to Prosperity" report for more attention to the "forgotten half" (those who do not go on to college) and ideas about how to address this issue.
I'd recommend visiting Westfield or Great Town.

But the message that everyone must screen for cancer has become so deep-rooted that when health care experts recommended that women under 50 and over 74 stop screening for breast cancer, it caused a riotous reaction among doctors, patients and advocacy groups.
Federation of American Societies for Experimental Biology recommended that every postdoctoral researcher put together an IDP m consultation with an adviser.
National Institutes of Health (NIH) Biomedical Research Workforce Working Group recommended that the NIH require IDPs for the approximately 32,000 postdoctoral researchers they support
It is recommended that engineering knowledge and suitable technology in developed countries be introduced to developing countries to improve produce handling in the harvest.

means.word_mean: 推荐, 介绍, 赞许某人[某事物]

sentences.en: Can you recommend a classmate who can take up the job?
sentences.cn: 你能不能推荐一位能承担这项工作的同学?

sentences.en: Can you recommend me a good book?
sentences.cn: 你能给我介绍一本好书吗?

sentences.en: I can recommend this play to all lovers of good theatre.
sentences.cn: 我把这个剧推荐给所有爱好优秀戏剧的人。

sentences.en: My neighbour recommended her own daughter as an excellent secretary!
sentences.cn: 我的邻居自荐她的女儿, 说她是个极好的秘书！

sentences.en: I recommend caution in dealing with this matter.
The committee has recommended that the training program (should) be improved.
sentences.cn: 委员会建议培训计划应当改进。

sentences.en: I wouldn't recommend him to go there.
This plan has much to recommend it.
sentences.cn: 这项计划有很多可取之处。

sentences.en: She recommended her baby to the care of an old woman.
sentences.cn: 她把婴儿托付给一位老太婆照管。

sentences.en: I have not any power in the firm except to recommend.
sentences.cn: 我在公司里除了有建议之权外，什么实权也没有。

jushi.english: Behaviour of that sort will not recommend you.
jushi.chinese: 那样的行为不会使别人对你有好感。

jushi.english: Can you recommend a good typist?
jushi.chinese: 你能推荐一位好的打字员吗?
